Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, this is my su-27 replica. What do you think about this?

![658e2401c04e67b2gen.jpg](http://images66.fotosik.pl/863/658e2401c04e67b2gen.jpg)
[Album](http://www.fotosik.pl/u/EbbsPL/album/1772898)

Download [here](http://www./download/l702zw8fun4i131/Su-27.craft)

I'd actually like to see the wings, to be honest, it's pretty easy to make the body of the Su27 but the wings are the challenge.

edit: just saw album lol

> 
> I'd actually like to see the wings, to be honest, it's pretty easy to make the body of the Su27 but the wings are the challenge.
> edit: just saw album lol

I think it looks good, but the wings were probably the hardest part for me ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
